summary: Request to implement a shared thread pool for the Ruby SDK. This issue was closed as obsolete due to an SDK rewrite that made the previous implementation no longer applicable.
userImpact: Users would benefit from optimized thread pool management for better resource utilization and performance.
resolutionDetails: The SDK underwent a rewrite/refresh and this issue no longer applies to the current version.
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
